tasks.task: Preparing garden for spring planting in a cold climate.
subtasks: Monitoring nighttime temperatures and adjusting planting schedules accordingly.
Protecting sensitive plants (e.g., tomatoes, peppers) from frost by covering them or bringing them indoors when temperatures drop.
Planting hardier crops (e.g., peas, onions) which can tolerate light frost.
Covering seedlings (e.g., Coleus) that are sensitive to cold until safer planting times.
Checking weather forecasts regularly to plan future planting dates.
Cleaning garden beds and preparing planting areas as temperatures warm.

tasks.task: Harvesting and utilizing dandelions for an herbal oil infusion.
subtasks: Collecting dandelion plants from the yard.
Processing dandelions for oil infusion (e.g., washing, chopping).
Preparing oil infusion (e.g., blending dandelions and oil, storing).
